title: Shipment: Setup shipment tracking subscriptions in production
description:
Description
POT shall provide its consumers updated shipment tracking information as soon as the information is available. To achieve this tracking information shall be consumed by the dedicated services for CRM-T and SeCeIT orders. The consumed information shall be processed, related to orders and made accessible by events for POT API consumers.
acceptance_criteria: POT publishes shipment events in productions for CRM-T orders
POT publishes shipment events in productions for SeCeIT orders
